purpose: Curate and provide a comprehensive list of Minecraft server projects and resources for developers and enthusiasts.
principle: Aggregates various Minecraft server projects, tools, and resources into a single repository for easy access and exploration.
reusability: Serves as a reference guide for Minecraft server projects, with links and descriptions to various projects and resources.
limitations: Primarily a collection of links without direct integration or automation features; dependent on external projects' availability and documentation.
name: awesome-mcp-servers
